title: Spacious 2 Bedroom 1 Bath Available October 1!
posting_body: Property Type: First Floor Apartment
Bedrooms: 2.0
Bathrooms: 1.0
Pets: No Pets
Parking: Off-street or garage parking available
Unit Tour:
https://smartfloorplan.com/p/t/shell5.php?id=v445516

Tucked away on a quiet one-way street in West Bucktown, this 2-Bed / 1-Bath unit is near the trendy restaurants and active nightlife of both Logan Square and Bucktown (including Revolution Brewing, Map Room, Ramen Wasabi, and many others).

Beautiful first floor unit includes a large front dining room, a separate living room, a massive kitchen with stainless steel appliances, a stone-tiled bathroom with full vanity, and a bonus 7’x9’ sunroom.
Laundry is available within the building and there is a grass lawn area in the back yard.
Unit is fully styled with hardwood floors, original build-in décor, a chandelier and canned lighting from 9.5’ ceilings.
There is easy temperature control via gas forced heat and central air, along with updated screened windows.
Tenants pay a flat $100 monthly fee for gas and electric utilities.
Additional high-tech conveniences include heated walkways to melt snow, electric entry locks, digital dimmer switches, and built in USB chargers.
Garage and off-street parking available for an additional fee.

Unit has great access to public transportation – just 3 blocks from Blue Line metro at California and 4 blocks to Blue Line metro at Western – with direct trains to downtown and O’Hare International Airport.
Only good credit scores considered.
Sorry – no cats or dogs allowed.
No realtors, leasing agents, or apartment locators should respond to this ad.
This 4-unit building is owned and managed by a professional who lives and works nearby, so it is very well maintained and professionally managed.
